abstract: Jon Stewart, the host of “The Daily Show,” normally traffics in jokes about the news, but he turned very serious on Thursday night as he focused on the stalled 9/11 health care bill.
snippet: Jon Stewart, the host of “The Daily Show,” normally traffics in jokes about the news, but he turned very serious on Thursday night as he focused on the stalled 9/11 health care bill.
lead_paragraph: Dec. 19, 8:34 p.m. | Updated Comedy Central had never seen anything like it.

headline.main: Jon Stewart, the Advocate, on the 9/11 Health Bill
